column2: The player starts with: Level 1, 5 Credits, 100 Health and 1 Random S1T0 Unit.
Credits Received at the Start of the Round: Base Income (5) + Interest Income (0-7) + Streak Income (0-3, only in PVP Rounds).
Credits received at the end of the Round: Win Bonus (1) in PVP Rounds  OR  PVE Rewards for each unit eliminated in PVE Rounds.
Credits owned at the end of the round
column5: For Round Durations, please check Match Flow Tab ->  Illuvium Gauntlet Public Info Document

column4: Current Credits at the end of the Round
column9: Income received at the end of the current Round
column12: Total Credits at the end of Current Round
column14: Total Income at the start of the next Round
column17: Total Credits At The Start of Next Round
